meanings.definition: (Rare) A variant spelling of the Hebrew name Yegar.
meanings.english_definition: (Rare) A variant spelling of the Hebrew name Yegar.

examples.sentence: Jegar is a unique and uncommon name.
examples.translation: Jegarはユニークで珍しい名前です。

etymology.value: Likely a variant of the Hebrew name Yegar, meaning "He will gather".

usage_notes.explanation: This is a rare name, likely a variant spelling. It is important to verify the correct spelling with the individual.

readability_explanation.text: This is a very uncommon name, so readability is not generally applicable. Understanding is dependent on familiarity with Hebrew names.
